entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is mentioned as someone who comes to see Ron in the hospital wing, and Harry is annoyed with her.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: Mclaggen is mentioned as a Quidditch player who thinks he can play every position better than the rest of the team, and Harry wants to get rid of him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who has already told Ron that McLaggen could be world class, but he doesn't want to keep him on the team.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is agitated and wants to go down to watch the Quidditch match, but Madam Pomfrey won't let him.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is mentioned as someone who won't let Ron go down to watch the Quidditch match because it would overexcite him.

relationships.description: Harry has an opinion about McLaggen's Quidditch skills, thinking he could be world class.
